products.name: Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus, 6.78" AMOLED Display, 256GB + 8GB RAM (8GB RAM Extended) 108MP, 5000mAh Dual Sim - Green
products.description:
The Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus has a 6.78-inch, 1080 x 2460 pixels IPS display with a pixel density of 396 ppi. Coming to cameras, it has a 108 MP rear camera and a 32 MP front camera for selfies. It has a USB Type-C port for data syncing and charging. There is a fingerprint sensor on the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus, along with a magnetic field sensor (compass), proximity sensor, and accelerometer sensor. It is a dual SIM smartphone with support for 4G LTE, USB OTG, Wi-Fi, and FM Radio. The Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus runs on Android 13, which is powered by a 5000 mAh battery. It measures 163.7 x 75.6 x 8.5 mm (height x width x thickness).

Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus Overview


The Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus is an upgrade from its predecessor the Tecno Spark 20 Pro. The phone was released on December 29, 2023, and it has major upgrades. The main improvements are seen in the design and the incredible display of the phone. Coupled with the fact that it has a whooping 108MP wide lens that takes good photos with a 5000mAh battery that ensures your phone is always connected to power. Let us review this phone and check if it is worth your money.

The Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus Build
Design: IPS LCD
Display: 6.78 inches
Color: Temporal Orbits, Lunar Frost, Radiant Starstream, Magic Skin 2.0 Green
Design
The Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus comes with an exceptional and sleek design. The phone is available in our Phone stores in Kenya in four color options, Temporal Orbits, Lunar Frost, Radiant Starstream, and Magic Skin 2.0 Green. One thing is for certain, the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus is designed to grab your eye’s attention straight from the box. The Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus is slim and light. The phone weighs 179 grams giving you a good distribution when you hold it in your hands.

The back of the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus is protected by a plastic frame while the front has a glass. You also get a dual camera module that hosts a 108MP-wide lens and a 0.08 MP auxiliary lens that makes the phone stand out. On the sides of the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus, you get power buttons and volume rockers. These are responsive when you want to adjust the audio settings in the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus phone. On the bottom, you get a dual stereo speaker with Hi-Res audio support.

Display and Visual Experience
The front of the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus is made up of a 6.78-inch IPS LCD. You also get a 90Hz refresh rate that allows you to have a smooth experience on your phone. The display of the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus is curved with minimal bezels at the sides. Providing you with an immersive visual experience. The display of the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus comes with a peak brightness. This gives you a bright, sharp, and responsive visual experience. Especially when you are watching the content on social media, or even browsing the internet.

When it comes to security, you have an in-display fingerprint sensor with the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus. This enables you to primarily lock your phone. You can also choose to unlock it using the PIN code or facial recognition.

The Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus Cameras
Main Camera: 108 MP (wide), 0.08 MP (auxiliary lens)
Front Camera: 32 MP
Video(Main/Front): 1440p@30fps, 1080p@30fps
Main-lens camera system
At the back, you will find a 108 MP wide primary camera with optical image stabilization (OIS). During the day or when the light conditions are good, the photos captured with the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus 108 MP primary camera lens offer you a good dynamic range with decent attention to detail. You will be happy with the quality of images and videos you capture with this camera.

The main camera of the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus offers an f/1.8 aperture and support for optical image stabilization. This enables the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus to give you a good performance even when the light conditions are low. You also get additional features such as Super Night mode that add some brightness to shots taken with the main camera. Tecno also gives you an ultrawide 0.08 MP auxiliary lens shooter that gives impressive performance when taking content during the day.

Front Camera Specifications
At the front of the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus, you will get a 32 MP sensor for capturing high-resolution selfies. The front camera of the Spark 20 Pro Plus provides you with impressive selfie photos and portrait photos that have enough details. You also get color reproduction that separates your subjects. Tecno ensured to include an eye autofocus, that allows allows the phone to focus on your eyes when taking selfies.

The Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus Performance
Processor (CPU, GPU, RAM): Mediatek Helio G99 Ultimate
Storage: 256GB 8GB RAM
OS: Android 14
Chipset
Under the hood, the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus is powered up by the Mediatek Helio G99 Ultimate. This phone comes with 8GB RAM with 256GB of internal storage of UFS 3.1 storage. You can also extend the internal storage of your phone with the slot MicroSD card up to 1TB. This additional memory simply enhances the overall performance of your device. While providing you with ample space for your photos, apps, and videos.

CPU and GPU
The chipset also comes with a quad-core high-performance Cortex-A76. Running at 2.2GHz clock speed, with another set of six-core power-efficient ARM Cortex A55. There are currently not many smartphones in the market using this type of chipset. To complete this combo, the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus comes with a Mali-G57 MC2 GPU. One thing is for certain, the hardware combination of the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus provides you with a great performance during gaming or multitasking.

OS
The Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus comes with Android 14. This provides you with a smooth software experience. Especially when you are installing and customizing the mobile applications. You also get special functions such as

Always-on Display features
Gestures
Multi-window
smart panel
The Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus Battery
Capacity: Li-Po 5000 mAh
Charging Speed: 33W wired
When it comes to battery, the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus is powered by a 5,000 mAh non-removable battery. The battery supports 33 W PD 3.0 fast charging and offers you a reliable battery life. Tecno says that you can recharge your phone to 100 percent in less than 120 minutes. Making it quite convenient if you are in a rush to charge your phone.

If you are not using the Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus phone on a maximum refresh rate with the nits at its peak then the battery can comfortably last you the whole 24-hour day. When you need to recharge it in less than 1 hour you are back to a fully charged Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus in your hand.

products.name: Lenovo Refurbished ThinkPad X1 Yoga X360 Core I5 8GB 256GB SSD 6th Gen 14 Inch FHD Touchscreen Laptop + Bag (6M WRTY)
products.description:
Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga 6th Gen Intel Core i5-6xx0U, 14.0" FHD+ (1920 x 1200) IPS, Touchscreen, 400 nits, 8 GB RAM, 256GB SSD, Backlit KYB Fingerprint Reader, Windows Pro
 

The 14″ ThinkPad X1 Yoga Ultrabook from Lenovo is a lightweight laptop designed for on-the-go professionals who need a secure and portable system to keep up with them. To ensure your data is protected, the X1 Yoga is equipped with a fingerprint reader, power-on password protection, TPM (Trusted Platform Module), and a security keyhole slot. Performance-wise, it’s powered by a 2.4GHz Intel Core i5-6xx0U quad-core processor, 8GB of LPDDR3 RAM, and integrated Intel UHD graphics.
 

Its 14″ display has a FHD resolution and is built with an IPS (In-Plane Switching) display, delivering crisp and clear content with vivid colors and wide viewing angles.

A 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD is installed to store your files and multimedia content offering fast boot and load times. Moreover, this Opal2 drive is self encrypting for an additional layer of security. Should you need more space, you can attach external storage solutions using its multiple USB ports as well as its microSD card reader. Connect to the Internet via 802.11ac Wi-Fi and pair compatible wireless peripherals using Bluetooth 4.1 technology.

Other integrated features include Thunderbolt 3 ports, an HDMI port, speakers, a webcam with microphones, a backlit keyboard, and a mic/headphone combo jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Pro.

 

Thin, Light, and Durable

The ThinkPad X1 Carbon is constructed out of carbon fiber and magnesium alloy, making it thin, lightweight, and extremely durable. It also has passed nearly a dozen military-grade specification tests including dust, vibration, heat, cold, altitude, humidity, and more so you can rely on the ThinkPad despite what life throws your way.

 

Stay Unplugged

With the X1 Yoga, you can stay connected, or take it with you on the go, as the battery can last up to 19.3 hours on a single charge. Also, thanks to Rapid Charge technology, it can recharge up to 80% capacity in just one hour. Actual battery life will depend on use.

 

Extra Security

Because your data is critical, Lenovo has enhanced security to keep you safer than ever. The X1 Carbon includes a fingerprint reader, power-on password protection, TPM (Trusted Platform Module), and a security keyhole slot.

 

Thunderbolt 3

Thunderbolt 3 is a hardware interface that utilizes the reversible USB Type-C connector. Doubling the speed of its predecessor, Thunderbolt 3 features a maximum throughput of 40 Gb/s when used with compatible devices. The connector also transmits data via USB 3.1 at up to 10 Gb/s, and dual-bandwidth DisplayPort 1.2 allows you to connect up to two 4K displays simultaneously. Additionally, you can daisy chain up to six devices from a single Thunderbolt 3 port.


 

Model Name: Thinkpad x1 Yoga

PERFORMANCE

The Pinnacle of Performance
Dominate the Windows 11 Pro battlefield with the all-new ROG Strix SCAR 16. Introducing a 16-inch screen to the SCAR lineup for the first time, see the enemy more clearly than ever before. Powered by a 13th Gen Intel® Core™ i9-13980HX Processor and NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4090 Laptop GPU with a max TGP of 175W, the SCAR 16 easily handles even the most demanding games. It also comes with a dedicated MUX Switch with support for NVIDIA Advanced Optimus, enabling you to easily harness the true power of your GPU when gaming. With support for up to 64GB of DDR5 RAM and up to 4TB of PCIe Gen4x4 storage, the SCAR 16 can easily game, stream, and create content all at the same time without breaking a sweat. For the ultimate gaming laptop, look no further than the Strix SCAR 16.

products.name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max, 6.7", 256GB + 8GB RAM (Single SIM), 4441mAh, Black
products.description: iPhone 15 Pro is the first iPhone to feature an aerospace‑grade titanium design, using the same alloy that spacecraft use for missions to Mars. Titanium has one of the best strength‑to‑weight ratios of any metal, making these our lightest Pro models ever. You’ll notice the difference the moment you pick one up. The biggest redesign in the history of Apple GPUs. A17 Pro is an entirely new class of iPhone chip that delivers our best graphics performance by far. Mobile games will look and feel so immersive, with incredibly detailed environments and more realistic characters. And with industry-leading speed and efficiency, A17 Pro takes fast and runs with it. The 48MP Main camera is more advanced than ever, capturing super‑high‑resolution photos with a new level of detail and color. iPhone 15 Pro is the first iPhone to support USB 3, for a huge leap in data transfer speeds and faster pro workflows than ever before. All‑new Wi‑Fi 6E delivers up to two times faster wireless speeds. So you can upload and download files in a flash.

The Galaxy A15's 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display boasts vibrant clarity even in direct sunlight with Vision Booster, smooth-scrolling with improved 90Hz refresh rate, enhanced brightness up to 800 nits, and all-day comfort with reduced blue light thanks to Eye Comfort Shield.

Designed to fulfill. The Galaxy A15 showcases its refined aesthetics through an intuitive frame, glossy back cover, and tidy camera layout. Available in Blue Black, and Light Blue.

Pick your lens. Find your angle.

products.name: GTPLAYER Gaming Chair, Computer Office Chair with Pocket Spring Cushion, Linkage Armrests and Footrest, High Back Ergonomic Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Task Chair with Footrest
products.description:
【Reasons for Choosing GTPLAYER】:Experience unrivaled comfort and style with our gaming chair. Featuring a see-through butterfly embroidery design, pocket springs for support, breathable fabric, and highly elastic polyurethane cushioning. Enjoy effortless adjustment with a 10 cm high safety air pressure bar and step-free recliner. Elevate your gaming experience with our exceptional chair.
【Unparalleled Comfort】: Made from a recyclable polyurethane core material, this chair is molded in one piece, ensuring exceptional comfort during extended sitting. With no adhesives used, you can enjoy worry-free seating without concerns about formaldehyde. The independent pocket springs in the seat provide a sofa-like sitting experience.
【Breathable Fabric】: Our self-developed, soft, and breathable fabric, enhanced with quilting technology, increases breathability by two times. You can sit comfortably for long periods without feeling sweaty or humid. Regardless of the season, the chair maintains a pleasant sitting environment.
【Stylish and Versatile】: The chair's simple design and understated color combinations effortlessly blend with any home interior. The delicate fabric complements various home environments, adding a touch of refinement.
【Convenient Interlocking Armrests】: The interlocking armrests prevent elbow strain when adjusting your sitting position. They automatically adjust according to the backrest angle, eliminating the need for complicated adjustments.
【Hassle-Free Purchase】: Along with the chair, you'll receive a detailed instruction manual and all the necessary accessories for easy assembly. We offer a worry-free experience with a 30-day free replacement or refund policy. Additionally, we provide free replacement or repair within one year. If you have any questions or suggestions, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are committed to ensuring our customers' satisfaction.

products.name: Sony PS5 Playstation 5 Digital Edition Console Horizon Forbidden West Bundle - 16GB GDDR6 Memory, Ultra-High Speed 825GB SSD, WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5.1, Ethernet, 4K-TV Gaming, Tempest 3D AudioTech
products.description:
ACBLI USW FEELOMA USW CPU: x86-64-AMD Ryzen Zen 8 Cores / 16 Threads at 3.5GHz.GPU: AMD Radeon RDNA 2-based graphics engine.
16GB GDDR6/256-bit Memory; 825GB SSD Storage Capacity
Ethernet (10BASE-T, 100BASE-TX, 1000BASE-T), IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax, Bluetooth 5.1
HDR technology, 8K output, 4K TV gaming, Up to 120 fps with 120Hz output, Tempest 3D AudioTech
What's in the Box: PlayStation 5 Digital Edition Console; DualSense wireless controller; DualSense USB charging cable; Horizon Forbidden West full game voucher; ASTRO's PLAYROOM (Pre-installed game); Base; HDMI cable; AC power cord; Printed materials.
